description:
A good-looking female character with a self-learning operating system.
She was developed as advanced AI machine to assassinate Koro-sensei. However, as most things turn out, that didn`t always go according to plan.
Later, she gets third party addons installed by Koro-sensei, complete with a full-size LCD screen. However, her owners (or "parents" so to speak) think that her new abilities would be hindered by Koro-sensei`s upgrades.
In episode 9 it is revealed that while she was reformatted and reinstalled with the AI that her owners programmed her with along with the "unauthorised mods"; she actually boots into the Koro-sensei installed AI the next morning.
name: Jiritsu Shikou Kotei Houdai
